author: sisbell
msg: Refactored artifact installer and context to allow passing in of remote artifact repos, rather than relying on the project. This allows standalone plugins, like vsinstaller, toresolve artifacts.

author: mturyn
msg: gets columns even, header and body
handles sized and unsized cases well,
Extraneous horizontal scrollbar in unsized case produces vertical scrollbar,
Upper "right corner above scrollbar missing" back under IE.
Shrink width after increasing width---no scrollbars under Firefox,
scrollbars probably there under IE only because they're there
With horizontal scrollbar under IE, header doesn't extend far enough.
Gap of ~2px between last cell in header and right boundary of domNode, Firefox only.
Problems may be associated with getting widths right---moved some table and header
widths back to "100%", both under setWidth() and _resizeTable(), away from explicit
widths dependent on the scrollDiv and domNode.
